entries.femaleVariant: Shrapnel from a grenade tore straight through my thigh.
We're barely out of the ICU when they roll up, cameras scrollin' fresh footage for the corp.
Then they packed up their cameras and forgot all about you...
Psh, yeah...
Tha'ss right. They gave us nova implants, preem med-care, even the big cats from the board showed up...
Me? I got blowed up.
Put our faces on T.V. – told us what to say. Wanted to show people how much they care about vets.
You a corpo?
Tell me or I shoot!
Nope, I'm not.
Max, drop the gun!
Max! Drop that iron, let's talk!
No...! You assholes won't take me alive!
Not a fucking suit. Name's V, Regina sent me.
Regina? Pssh...
Tell her she can get fucked.
She just wants to help.
That gun loaded?
So why do that veteran piece? If we're all so fresh outta fucks to give?
Why the suicide threats, huh?
Thought you were a corpo, sent to silence me.
So you woulda died anyway.
But on my own terms! The bastards control everything, but me, I get to decide when I go! I do!
Tell Regina that, too. Not gonna break, not like her.
When did medias become crack-explosives experts?
You mean the mines? Courtesy of the vets you just heard over the PA.
Little token of gratitude for listening and actually giving a fuck. They were trying to protect me.
Help me out? She's the one who needs help.
Regina was your mentor?
She was the best media I knew! Shit, she was my mentor! And now? Pssh – sold right out.
Regina was your mentor?
Uh-huh.
Things used to be different... a media's word fucking meant something.
You dying wouldn't change a thing.
Not just mine. She was the best war reporter in Night City.
Yeah. Like I said. Sold out.
'Kay, you're startin' to bore me. Let's go.
I'm not going anywhere.
Then I'll make you.
Medias are out, fixers are in.
Cool. We'll put "Never ever sold out" on your tombstone.
"Never ever sold out." That'll look great on your tombstone.
You should lay low with the nomads.
Heh, good luck.
You make some sharp points, V. I even got a title for this scene – "A Jab at the Truth."
Christ, you're stubborn. It's getting on my nerves.
Shut it.
And here I thought I was bad with medias.
Shut up.
You got him? How heavy's the burden of free speech?
Johnny. Please.
Sure, I'm gone. Just like your conscience.
But I won't be bought! Not me!
Better than "sellout bitch."
You really hate Regina that much?
Was talking about you... D--... doesn't it bother you? The PR machines, 24/7 lies, the cover-ups...?
But then she turned fixer.
And now? You can prove Holt's in Arasaka's pocket, and nobody gives a flying turdfuck.
Put you in touch with some nomads. Join 'em, ride with 'em, let this blow over. Give yourself a break.
A break from what? From responsibility?
Sorry, but that's not my style.
Yeah, 'cause I'm sure Regina's the one keepin' Yorinobu up at night.
You think you're hot shit, but you might as well be a fly buzzing in a corpo's ear.
Regina sent me. Toss him in!
Mhm.
At the very least, it'd mean a lot to her.
You got an itch for the truth, don't ya? If you wanna know who Regina is now, what she really fights for – just go and see her.
So that people'd start asking questions. Start wondering. Just like you, now.
Maybe that little grain of discomfort will grow into dissent. Who knows? Figure it's worth a try.
Why'd you threaten to kill yourself?
That loaded?
Stubborn? In my line of work, that's a compliment.
By...
Just your usual IED – Improvised Explosive Device.
The show – "In Blood We Serve."
And get this – those implants? We had to give 'em back.
Replaced 'em with these first-gen pieces o' garbage...
They did us dirty, yo. Took everythin' from us. Tossed us like... like...
It's OK. I understand.
A chauffeur? What's next? Champagne? Black market synth-cigars?
Heard your interview.
Heard your interview on the way up.
Started broadcasting the moment you showed up on the feed.
It wasn't finished, not like I wanted it... But, at least people got the truth.
We tracked those sons-o'-bitches' every dirty move.
Where'd these mines come from?
There's a death-warrant out for you, but you probably already knew that.
People nowadays... they don't get that...
She deserves a chance. Just talk to her.
Sorry about this, Max...
I'll talk to her. But that's it.
That's all I ask.
'Kay. Just gotta download a few things.
Do what you gotta do.
It's not medias they're losing sleep over. It's fixers with razor-sharp intel. The kind that'll slit your throat.
So why are you still reporting?
C'mon, let's go. You go the way of the gonk here – won't change a thing.
Running won't change anything either. I'll manage without your help.
Psh, you don't know jack.
So I'll keep buzzing.
No time to waste – let's go.
Yeah, I could give a shit, too. But Regina wants to help you out.
This all out of spite for Regina? You got something to prove to her?
Max?
This is starting to bore me. Let's go.
